name: United Kingdom
description: Make cheap calls to the United Kingdom with ZippCall. Stay connected with friends, family, and businesses across the UK at competitive rates without any app downloads. Enjoy crystal-clear connections to both mobile phones and landlines throughout England, Scotland, Wales, and Northern Ireland.
callTips: The best time to call the United Kingdom is between 9am and 9pm UK time. Remember that the UK uses GMT in winter and BST (GMT+1) in summer, so adjust your calling time accordingly.
businessInfo: The UK has a service-oriented economy with major sectors including financial services, technology, manufacturing, and healthcare. Standard business hours are typically 9am-5pm Monday through Friday, though many financial institutions in London operate on longer hours.

popularCities.name: London
popularCities.description: The capital and financial center of the UK, home to numerous multinational corporations, cultural institutions, and a diverse international population.

popularCities.name: Manchester
popularCities.description: A major industrial and commercial hub known for its vibrant culture, music scene, and premier league football clubs.

popularCities.name: Birmingham
popularCities.description: The UK's second-largest city and a major center for business, retail, and cultural activities.

popularCities.name: Edinburgh
popularCities.description: Scotland's capital city, known for its historic architecture, festivals, and as an important financial and educational center.

popularCities.name: Cardiff
popularCities.description: The capital of Wales and a major commercial center with growing importance in media, finance, and creative industries.

faqs.question: How do I dial a UK number correctly?
faqs.answer: To call the UK, dial your country's exit code, then +44, followed by the area code (without the initial 0) and the local number. For example, to call a London number 020 1234 5678, you would dial +44 20 1234 5678.

faqs.question: Are there different rates for calling UK landlines versus mobile phones?
faqs.answer: With ZippCall, we offer a single competitive rate for calling both landlines and mobile phones in the United Kingdom, making it simple to stay connected regardless of the number you're calling.

faqs.question: Can I call UK toll-free numbers using ZippCall?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can call UK toll-free numbers (0800 or 0808) with ZippCall, though our standard international rates will apply rather than them being free.

meta.title: Cheap Calls to United Kingdom - Low-Cost UK Calling | ZippCall
meta.description: Make affordable calls to the United Kingdom from just $0.02/min with ZippCall. No downloads needed, call directly from your browser to any UK number.
